author: danicuki
title: Latam Women Cardano Plutus Bootcamp
description: It is a challenge to bring more diversity to web3 and Cardano developers communities. In Latam, we see too few women present in circles
solution: We will create an open source bootcamp partnered with https://laboratoria.la/ and fully train 30 women to program for Cardano stack.
experience:
DC: CS PhD, 25 yrs as software engineer in Java, Ruby, Elixir, etc. Entrepreneur, CTO
MC: Stakepool Admin, Alumni Cardano Ambassador
